scripts.scripts: mkdir -p dist/scripts && browserify app/scripts/main.js -o dist/scripts/bundle.js -t babelify -p [minifyify --no-map]
scripts.scripts-watch: mkdir -p dist/scripts && watchify app/scripts/main.js -o dist/scripts/bundle.js -d -t babelify
scripts.styles: mkdir -p dist/styles && node-sass --output-style compressed app/styles/main.scss dist/styles/main.css
scripts.styles-watch: mkdir -p dist/styles && node-sass -w -r --source-map true app/styles/main.scss dist/styles/main.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run templates && npm run scripts && npm run styles && npm run images
scripts.serve: npm run build && concurrently -k "npm run templates-watch" "npm run scripts-watch" "npm run styles-watch" "browser-sync start --server 'dist' --files 'dist'"
